description:
Based in St. Louis, Missouri, the Brown & Crouppen law firm has served the injured and disabled across our region since 1979. During that time, we have helped thousands of clients obtain the full amount of compensation they need to cover their medical bills, lost wages and other damages resulting from a workplace injury or an accident caused by another party's negligence.

Regarded as one of the premier personal injury law firms in the area, we have achieved unprecedented success advocating on behalf of our plaintiff clients, netting more than $850 million in total compensation thus far. Our attorneys have more than 50 years of combined legal experience handling all types of personal injury and wrongful death cases, medical malpractice claims, Social Security Disability and workers' compensation claims, and other liability lawsuits. This means we possess the skills and resources necessary to handle your case no matter how complex.

As further evidence of our success, we now have seven total law offices in the Greater St. Louis metro region, and Missouri Lawyers Weekly voted us as the area's "Winningest Plaintiff Law Firm." For a free evaluation of your claim, you can contact Brown & Crouppen by calling our office or visiting our website to schedule an appointment. As part of our no-fee guarantee, you will not owe us a cent unless we secure compensation on your behalf.
